edu.ncsu.csc216.flix_2.rental_system

Class DVDRentalSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.flix_2.rental_system.DVDRentalSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RentalManager

    public class DVDRentalSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements RentalManager
    Represents the rental system where the movies for rent are stored in an inventory and where there are different customers. Movies can be reserved, checked out for home, and returned to the inventory. Movies in the the inventory, reserves, and at home can be located by position.
    Author:
    Nick Brust, Eric Matysek
